sentences.sContent: ‘Love at first sight’ is a very apt description of how he felt when he saw her.
sentences.sCn: 用“一见钟情”来形容他见到她时的感觉再恰当不过。

sentences.sContent: She had taught him French and he had been an apt student.
sentences.sCn: 她教过他法语，他一直是个聪慧的学生。

sentences.sContent: ...you may be more apt to delay thinking about these issues...

synos.tran: 恰当的；有…倾向的；灵敏的

remMethod.val: 本身为词根， 意为： 适应， 能力； 参考： adapt(vt. 使适应； 改编)

trans.tranOther: exactly right for a particular situation or purpose
